synopsis: In this heartfelt episode of Pineapple Plant Rotation, hosts Devam and Ahir dive into the complex emotions surrounding breakups. They share personal experiences, insightful reflections, and the importance of self-discovery and healing, encouraging listeners to embrace their feelings and seek support during tough times.
quotes: To love means to let go.
It's very easy to hold on to the things that give you the most comfort in a moment because regardless of what may or may not happen in the future, the reality is that you have to move on.
The moment I tried to distract myself from my feelings, that's when I stopped making progress.
It's tough for me to answer what healing is entirely because I'm not very healed yet.
You have to build a stronger foundation within yourself.
Sometimes, you just need to remind yourself that it won't always feel like this.
It's okay to talk about your issues even if you're going through a tough time.
Feelings are real, and if you push them down, they're going to come out in bad ways.
It's good to give yourself perspective, but that doesn't mean your problems aren't legitimate.
I wish everyone the best, but I also can't help feeling that love is a sham sometimes.
